description:
Since the Edo periods of Japan, gladiator arenas exist in certain areas. In these arenas, wealthy business owners and merchants hire gladiators to fight in unarmed combat where winner takes all. Toki Taouma, nicknamed "Ashura", joins these arenas and devastates his opponents. His spectacular ability to crush his enemies catches the attention of the big business owners, including the Nogi Group chairman, Nogi Hideki.

(Source: MangaHelpers)

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

name.native: ユリウス・ラインホルト

alternative: Kao no Nai Otoko (顔のない男‚ The Faceless Man)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.

node.description:
A Japanese rock band from Shibuya, Tokyo. Formed in 2011, the band currently consists of vocalist Hiroki Moriuchi, guitarist Teruki Nishizawa, bassist Nobuaki Katou, and drummer Shouhei Sasaki.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/leonardosanthos) | [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/leonardosanthos) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/leonardosanthos) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@FalaCritica) | [Twitch](http://www.twitch.tv/FalaCritica)

Leonardo Santhos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and streamer.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Blitzcrank, the Great Steam Golem / Kog'Maw, The Mouth of the Abyss / Vel'Koz, the Eye of the Void / Wukong, the Monkey King (League of Legends)
- Pierce Wheels (Ben 10: Alien Force)
- Peter "Pete" Devin / Master Carter (BONDiNG)
- Agent Bratcher (Outer Banks)
- Henrich Zemo / Baron Zemo (1st voice; The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes)
- Soren (The Dragon Prince)
- Myst (Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Spartan Jared Miller (Halo 4)
- Tetsuya Fukazawa (Ju-On: Origins)
- Kyd Miller (1st voice - 10th season; The X-Files)
- Onix (Gears of War: Judgement)
!~

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Chom2Start)  |  [SOUL OF JOE (fansite)](http://soulofjoe.jp/index.html)

Currently working for Studio M2.

He's an Ashita no Joe ''collector'' and fan and has contributed to books, TV programs, museums and more. He is also an administrator of the fansite ''SOUL OF JOE''.

**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/megblz/)**

**Megan Buchholz** is an American actress, dialogue director and script/screenwriter for anime.

**Robert Buchholz** is an American producer, voice actor, script/screenwriter, story editor, and voice director. He has produced voices for anime and video games. Robert is the owner of Spliced Bread Productions.
